formattedAddress: 29 W 36th St. 2nd floor, New York, NY 10018, USA
adrFormatAddress: 29 W 36th St. 2nd floor, New York, NY 10018, USA

originalText.text: I am a new student here at Brittany Beauty Academy Manhattan and so far, this has been one of the best experiences. Transferring from a college where I felt lost and hopeless, to this Beauty School where I feel direction and passion, has truly given a new purpose to my life. From the day I first stepped into this building, getting my tour from Noemi Ramos, I felt welcomed and guided. She was energetic, answered every one of my questions with ease, and was understanding. The transition process has been seamless, and everyone involved made it easy and hassle free. Joining Brittany Beauty Academy was one of the best decisions I have made, and I know I will be prepared for my future career as an Esthetician.

originalText.text:
I was recommended this school by my really great friend and I am so happy that she did I met with Noemi and she was extremely helpful in sharing the history of the school and what the school offers. Noemi gave me a tour of the school and was extremely thorough with explaining what everything was and how it would be useful for me in the certification that I am looking to get. Randy was exceptionally helpful as well with assisting me with my financial aid and helping me become qualified to receive more money (that really meant a lot to me considering I‚Äôve never took out a loan in my life and it settled me a lot more to know that I‚Äôd be paying less money back, even if it‚Äôs a little)  I am extremely excited about starting this new journey and I am extremely excited about starting with Brittany beauty Academy.
Thank you Noemi !

originalText.text: My name is Mirela. I am current student in this school. I would like to talk about my experience at this school. The teachers and the staff are very kind and nice. My first connection to the school was with Noemi Ramos and she was very helpful. After I had spoken with her I was confident in my choice of attending this school, and she helped me out in making my final decision. I am thankful for her help in my transition to this school. I am happy that I became a student in this school because now I can achieve my dreams.

originalText.text: I‚Äôve been attending Brittany Beauty School for 5months. Since I‚Äôve started it has been a wonderful experience Ms. Noemi in admissions helped me with enrollment. Ms. Noemi wasn‚Äôt pushy with trying to enroll me, nor did she seem to be in a rush with taking my money so fast just to attend . She was able to answer all my questions and inform me with things I didn‚Äôt know about enrollment.
